title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and Go library for pulling, running and chatting with large language models locally.
highlights: pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript client library for Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that plugs into local Ollama instances.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with async, streaming and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Simple Python CLI chat wrapper with conversation memory and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerised with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed REST client and async Tokio support for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within your knowledge base.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for the Ollama JavaScript SDK.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for the Ollama Python client.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of Ollama projects.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama v0.1 release highlighting local LLM tooling trends.
